customize.name: Clorinde
customize.desc:

Vanquisher of Phantoms, Vigil of the Long Night

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text: Can also be exchanged using a

customize.name: Blank Dynamic Card
customize.desc: A blank card with a painted back. It is said that if you put the name of your desired dynamic card on this blank card, you can get the very skin from the Association agent located at the tavern.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"I've memorized all the effects of the cards... You don't need to hold back, feel free to attack."
<color=#ece5d8>Hint: Clorinde's deck revolves around "Healing" and "Bond of Life," and excels at quickly dealing damage within a single turn.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Clorinde
customize.desc:
"Candlebearer, Shadowhunter" Clorinde

Vanquisher of Phantoms, Vigil of the Long Night

customize.name: Sigewinne
customize.desc:

"Pure spirit, heed my wish."

customize.name: Furina
customize.desc:
"Endless Solo of Solitude" Furina

Perpetual muse of chansons and rondeaux.

customize.name: Match Invitation Letter
customize.desc: You can select a player from the Player List via the invitation board, and then entrust The Cat's Tail to send out an invitation using this Invitation Letter. The invited player will head over to the tavern and wait for a duel with you.

"Where evil lurks, shoot on sight!"

customize.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Achieve victory with characters defeated less than twice during the battle</color>

customize.name: Dark-Shattering Flame
customize.desc:
Clorinde: Dark-Shattering Flame

"Where evil lurks, shoot on sight!"

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"I will be more cautious this time. I look forward to a most exciting 'Duel' with you."
<color=#ece5d8>Special Rule: "Clorinde" starts with the Talent Card "Dark-Shattering Flame" equipped.</color>

customize.name: Player EXP
customize.desc: Obtained by winning Genius Invokation TCG matches. Every duel you won builds upon the paths to victory, such is the act of earning experience itself. To know how to overcome and subdue the adversary in any situation is the greatest strength that a player can possess.

value.name: Dark-Shattering Flame
value.desc:
Clorinde: Dark-Shattering Flame

"Where evil lurks, shoot on sight!"

value.text: Reward for inviting Clorinde to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

value.name: Clorinde
value.desc: An undefeated Champion Duelist. Sword in hand, she defends justice in the Court of Fontaine.

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Normal Attack</color>
Deals 1 <color=#ffffff>Physical DMG</color> . If this character has <color=#ffffff>Night Vigil</color> attached, this Skill costs 1 less <color=#ffffff>Unaligned Element</color> .
<color=#ece5d8>Night Vigil</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
When a character receives healing apart from <color=#ffffff>Hunter's Vigil</color> , it is replaced by an equivalent amount of <color=#ffffff>Bond of Life</color> .
<color=#ffffff>After the character to which this is attached uses a Normal Attack:</color> The <color=#ffffff>Physical DMG</color> dealt is converted to <color=#ffacff>Electro DMG</color> , and said character gains 2 stacks of <color=#ffffff>Bond of Life</color> .
<color=#ffffff>Duration (Rounds): 1</color>

<color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill</color>
Attach <color=#ffffff>Night Vigil</color> to self, then remove all of your <color=#ffffff>Bond of Life</color> . Based on the number of stacks removed, deal <color=#ffacff>Electro DMG</color> and heal yourself. (DMG and healing are capped at 4 points)
<color=#ece5d8>Night Vigil</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
When a character receives healing apart from <color=#ffffff>Hunter's Vigil</color> , it is replaced by an equivalent amount of <color=#ffffff>Bond of Life</color> .
<color=#ffffff>After the character to which this is attached uses a Normal Attack:</color> The <color=#ffffff>Physical DMG</color> dealt is converted to <color=#ffacff>Electro DMG</color> , and said character gains 2 stacks of <color=#ffffff>Bond of Life</color> .
<color=#ffffff>Duration (Rounds): 1</color>
<color=#ece5d8>Bond of Life</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>When the character to which this is attached is healed:</color> This effect will be consumed once for every <color=#ffffff>Usage(s)</color> it has to negate 1 HP of healing received. (Cannot negate revives or healing caused by redistribution of HP)
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s): 1</color> (Can stack, no stack limit).

<color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst</color>
Deals 3 <color=#ffacff>Electro DMG</color> , and attaches 4 stacks of <color=#ffffff>Bond of Life</color> to self.
<color=#ece5d8>Bond of Life</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>When the character to which this is attached is healed:</color> This effect will be consumed once for every <color=#ffffff>Usage(s)</color> it has to negate 1 HP of healing received. (Cannot negate revives or healing caused by redistribution of HP)
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s): 1</color> (Can stack, no stack limit).

Applies Electro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
[ <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> + <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Overloaded</color> : DMG +2 for this instance, the target is forcibly switched to the next character
[ <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> + <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Superconduct</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
[ <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> + <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Electro-Charged</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
[ <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> + <color=#99ff88>Dendro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Quicken</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [ <color=#ffffff>Catalyzing Field</color> ] that grants +1 DMG to the next 2 instances of Dendro or Electro DMG

<color=#ece5d8>Physical DMG</color>
Physical DMG will not apply any Elements, nor can it engage in Elemental Reactions.
<color=#ece5d8>Duration (Rounds)</color>
Each time you reach the end of a Round, <color=#ffffff>Duration (Rounds)</color> -1.
This card will be discarded immediately once <color=#ffffff>Duration (Rounds)</color> runs out.
<color=#ece5d8>Unaligned Element</color>
You may use Elemental Dice of any element to pay this type of cost.
<color=#ece5d8>Usage(s)</color>
After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#ffffff>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.
This card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#ffffff>Usages</color> remaining.
